summary:
Commercial professional with experience in sales management, pricing setting, business development and sourcing strategies in the maritime industry, including different sectors like marine terminals, intermodal facilities and shipping line; collaborating with logistic market leaders as Maersk Line, APM Terminals and Hutchison Ports. Passionate on strategic plans, commercial management and people development.

Personal objective:
Creating sustainable growth and added value in the supply chain for logistics vendors and customers. Creating short term wins and long term success. Challenge the business environment to create a sustainable strategy in order to increase efficiency / effectiveness and to exceed targets.

Personal key qualifications:
Result & customer oriented
Strong analytical skills
Stake holder management 
High level conceptual thinking while able to act hands-on
Creative
Persistent
Ambitious

Specialties: 
Strategy development route-to-market.
Sourcing strategy development and execution.
New business development.
International business & sales.
Technical consulting sales.
Project based sales
